ComicInfo.Summary:
Merlin is ready to usher in a new golden Age of Camelot and with his new Knights of the Round table and his deadly assassin Zodiac he's ready to destroy anyone who stands in his way. The War Camelot continues in this issue.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Edgar Salazar & Ivan Nunes | 1 | B | Cover B | Anthony Spay & Hedwin Zaldivar | 2 | C | Cover C | Derlis Santacruz & Sanju Nivangune | 3 | D | Cover D | Igor Vitorino & Ivan Nunes | 4 | E | InStore Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 100 | Elias Chatzoudis | Missing | F | Zenescope Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 750 | Geebo Vigonte (a) & Ivan Nunes (c) | Missing |
